Create an account For companies

Secure and private messaging, under your control.

Your Gmail content is never used for advertising purposes

Gmail encrypts all your messages, received and sent, using state-of-the-art encryption. Your content in Gmail is never used for the purpose of personalizing ads.

Every day, Gmail protects the mail of more than a billion users

Gmail prevents 99.9% of spam, malware, and dangerous links from reaching your inbox.

The most advanced protections against phishing

When you receive a suspicious email that might be legitimate, Gmail notifies you and lets you decide.

Advanced control over sent emails

Confidential mode lets you set expiration dates and ask recipients to validate their identity via SMS. You can also remove the transfer, copy, download and print options.

Gain efficiency with Gmail

Stay connected and organized

Start a chat, join a video call with Meet, or collaborate on a document, all directly from Gmail.

Improve your productivity and efficiency

With features like Smart Compose, write your emails and messages faster so you can spend more time on your favorite tasks.

Never forget to respond

Discreet reminders help you not miss anything.

Gmail is even better in the app

Express yourself using emoji

Reply to emails easily and fun with emoji reactions, only available in the Gmail app.

We will start rolling out this feature in October 2023

Find your emails faster

Simplified UI on phone showing an email welcoming Helen to the team. The enlarged emoji bar shows that it's easy to respond with an emoji.

Switch from one account to another

Find all your email accounts in one app.

Find all your email accounts in one app.

Compatible with other tools

Gmail works great with desktop clients like Microsoft Outlook, Apple Mail, and Mozilla Thunderbird, including syncing contacts and events.

Be productive, even offline

With Gmail Offline, read, delete, reply to, or search Gmail messages without being connected to the Internet.

Use Gmail on any device

Enjoy the simplicity of Gmail, wherever you are.

Gmail is now part of Google Workspace

Collaborate faster, on any device, at any time, in a single interface.

Google Workspace is a set of productivity and collaboration tools that help users, teams, and businesses stay on top of what matters. It's a flexible and innovative solution for professionals and individuals that includes all your favorite apps like Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs, Meet, and more.
